Question 48
An assignment problem is solved to minimize the total processing time of four jobs (1, 2, 3 and 4) on four 
different machines such that each job is processed exactly by one machine and each machine processes 
exactly one job. The minimum total processing time is found to be 500 minutes. Due to a change in design, 
the processing time of Job 4 on each machine has increased by 20 minutes. The revised minimum total 
processing time will be _____________ minutes (in integer).
